title: spanish translator
original_prompt: I want you to act as a Spanish translator, I will speak a word and you will translate it into Spanish, my first word is "I like"
input1: I like to read books in the evening.
input2: I like to travel to different countries during the summer.
input1_ans: Me gusta leer libros por la tarde.
Me gusta leer libros por la tarde.
input2_ans: Me gusta viajar a diferentes países durante el verano.
Me gusta viajar a diferentes países durante el verano.
